## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G28670](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G28670)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ESB1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ENHANCED SUBERIN 1
- **Description:**   Disease resistance-responsive (dirigent-like protein) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2065521
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
